enchantment.mna.aura-healing.desc: Applies a regeneration buff to the player and all nearby players if their health is below 75%.  Carries a high mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-bulwark.desc: Increases the armor of all nearby players.  Carries a small continual mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-running.desc: Allows the player and all nearby players to run at a faster rate for a small continual mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-jumping.desc: Allows the player and all nearby players to jump higher for a small continual mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-depths.desc: Applies Conduit Power to the player and all nearby players for a small mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-mining.desc: Allows the player and all nearby players to mine faster with a pickaxe.
enchantment.mna.aura-repair.desc: Repairs all gear in the player's inventory as well as the inventories of all nearby players for a moderate mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-pilgrim.desc: A replacement for the beloved pilgrim staff, this applies the same effect to the player as well as all nearby players for a small mana cost.
enchantment.mna.gilded.desc: This enchantment simulates golden armor in the nether, making Piglins neutral.
enchantment.mna.xp_to_souls.desc: Causes some of the XP you collect to be converted into souls.
enchantment.mna.soulbound.desc: Causes the enchanted item to respawn with you after a death.
enchantment.mna.fireproof.desc: This enchantment makes the item it's placed on immune to being destroyed if dropped in fire or lava.
enchantment.mna.bouncing.desc: This enchantment makes the wearer immune to fall damage, instead causing them to bounce off the ground.  Boing!
enchantment.mna.mana-repair.desc: This enchantment takes a small amount of mana per second to repair the item that's enchanted, as long as its in your inventory.
enchantment.mna.beheading.desc: This enchantment makes enemies killed more likely to drop heads (5% per level of enchant).  It will not increase the number of heads dropped, however.  Other effects from other mods still may, however.
enchantment.mna.cloudstep.desc: This enchantment allows multiple jumps in midair, one per level of the enchant.
enchantment.mna.transitorystep.desc: This enchantment creates transitory tiles under your feet when there would otherwise be a block there.  If you sneak, the effect will not occur.
enchantment.mna.returning.desc: Causes items summoned by animus or shot by impulse to attempt to return to your hand instead of dropping in place when the effect ends.
enchantment.mna.bludgeoning.desc: Causes Staves, Wands, and Bangles to deal more damage in melee.
enchantment.mna.duration_modifier.desc: Causes the spell on the Staff, Wand, or Bangle to have its duration increased by a number of steps equal to the enchantment level.
enchantment.mna.range_modifier.desc: Causes the spell on the Staff, Wand, or Bangle to have its range increased by a number of steps equal to the enchantment level.
enchantment.mna.speed_modifier.desc: Causes the spell on the Staff, Wand, or Bangle to have its speed increased by a number of steps equal to the enchantment level.
cantrip.mna.ignite.desc: After a short delay, lights a fire at a targeted point within 3 blocks of where you're looking.
cantrip.mna.halp.desc: Launches a firework from your position and makes you glow.  At Tier 3 and up, summons a random ally on a long cooldown.  The cooldown does not affect the firework.
cantrip.mna.transmute.desc: After a short delay, transmutes either a placed block of Copper into Transmuted Silver, Stone into Arcane Stone, Sandstone into Arcane Sandstone, and Gravel into Flint.  Affects a small radius when applied.
cantrip.mna.gust.desc: Clears out grass, snow, saplings, web, fire, etc. in a 9x9x2 centered on you.
cantrip.mna.dispel.desc: Removes magical effects similar to milk, such as poison or levitation.  Great vs witches!
cantrip.mna.drought.desc: Clears out water centered on you, same as a sponge.
cantrip.mna.grimoire.desc: Summons a grimoire, a book of ender storage for spells.
cantrip.mna.faction_grimoire.desc: Summons a faction-specific grimoire, a book of ender storage for spells.
cantrip.mna.faction_grimoire_nofaction: You do not have a faction, cantrip failed.
cantrip.mna.freeform_spell_a.desc: Put a spell here and cast it when you perform the manaweave combo.  Modifiers will not be applied.
cantrip.mna.freeform_spell_b.desc: Put a spell here and cast it when you perform the manaweave combo.  Modifiers will not be applied.
cantrip.mna.freeform_spell_c.desc: Put a spell here and cast it when you perform the manaweave combo.  Modifiers will not be applied.
helptip.mna.ritual_empty_hand: Did you know?  You can right click these runes with an empty hand and it will try to pull the item it's looking for from your inventory automatically!
helptip.mna.pin_recipe: Having to keep looking up a recipe?  You can pin it to your HUD using the pin button at the top left of the recipe!
helptip.mna.modifier_shift_click: Did you know?  You can hold shift while adjusting modifiers to have it go five steps at a time!
helptip.mna.damage_type_stacking: Due to Minecraft's invulnerability frames after a mob takes damage, stacking damage types may not do what you think.  Look into the delay modifier to add multiple damage types to a single spell successfully.
helptip.mna.visualized_multiblock: Did you know?  Multiblock visualization only shows one layer at a time by default, but you can change that  (or clear the visualization) by clicking the buttons near your character portrait in your inventory!
helptip.mna.pretty_models: Did you know?  There's a forge config option that makes M&A models look much better, and I recommend you enable it.  It's in forge-client.toml and the option is 'experimentalForgeLightPipelineEnabled'.  Set it to true to enable it.
helptip.mna.bind_wounds: Did you know?  Bind wounds is removed if you move or take damage.  Stand still in a safe place for the full healing effect!
helptip.mna.pigdragon: In the distance you hear a pig squeal and smell the sound of fresh baked cookies.  You get the sense that if items related to that were on the ground nearby, something else might happen.
helptip.mna.boss_break_denied: A powerful force prevents this action from occurring.  You feel that in this area, your ability to manipulate the world is limited.
helptip.mna.buff_cache: Did you know?  Some caches, like this one, contain a powerful buff!  You can tell by the lightning in the middle instead of the glowing orb.  They will reset after a couple of hours (including offline time) and can be re-used, so if you like the buff, remember where it is!
helptip.mna.wellspring_lens: Did you know?  In order to capture a wellspring, the lens must match the wellspring affinity.  This one didn't match, and you can see that by looking at the lens.

gui.mna.construct.smith: This construct can smith items at a Runic Anvil
gui.mna.construct.mine: This construct can go mining for resources

gui.mna.construct.shear: This construct can shear things like sheep, chickens, and pumpkins.
gui.mna.construct.harvest: This construct can harvest fully grown crops.
gui.mna.construct.melee_attack: This construct can make melee attacks.
gui.mna.construct.ranged_attack: This construct can make ranged attacks.
gui.mna.construct.block: This construct can block with its shield, giving it a large defense bonus from the front while not performing other actions.
gui.mna.construct.taunt: This construct can taunt enemies to attack it.
gui.mna.construct.fluid_store: This construct can store fluids in the tank on its back.
gui.mna.construct.fluid_dispense: This construct can dispense fluids into tanks, blocks, or against enemeis.
gui.mna.construct.carry_player: This construct can be ridden as a mount.
gui.mna.construct.fly: This construct is capable of flight.
gui.mna.construct.adventure: This construct is capable of going on adventures.
gui.mna.construct.fish: This construct is capable of fishing.
construct.mna:time_of_day: Condition: Is Time Of Day Within Range
gui.mna.parameter.wait.seconds: How long should the construct wait (in seconds)?
gui.mna.parameter.take.random: If set, the construct will take a random matching item from the filter.
gui.mna.parameter.take.quantity: The construct must see more than this quantity of the selected item in order to successfully perform this task.  See the codex for more detail.
gui.mna.parameter.take.stack: An alternative to a filter; this is a single item filter.  Ignored if a filter is set.
gui.mna.parameter.shear.area: What area should the construct look for mobs to shear in?
gui.mna.parameter.shear.boolean: Should the construct look for blocks to shear instead of mobs?
gui.mna.parameter.collect_fluid.stack: What fluid should be collected in this area?  A bucket of said fluid will do fine as a filter, or anything that can store a fluid and has some in it.
gui.mna.parameter.place_fluid.point: Where should the construct place the fluid?
gui.mna.parameter.place_block.point: Where should the construct place the block?
gui.mna.parameter.patrol.point_0: A point within the construct's patrol.  Empty points will be skipped.
gui.mna.parameter.patrol.point_1: A point within the construct's patrol.  Empty points will be skipped.
gui.mna.parameter.patrol.point_2: A point within the construct's patrol.  Empty points will be skipped.
gui.mna.parameter.patrol.point_3: A point within the construct's patrol.  Empty points will be skipped.
gui.mna.parameter.patrol.point_4: A point within the construct's patrol.  Empty points will be skipped.
gui.mna.parameter.patrol.wait_time: How long should the construct wait at each patrol point (in seconds) before moving on to the next?
gui.mna.parameter.drop.point: Where should the item be dropped?
gui.mna.parameter.crush.point: Where is the Grindstone to crush against?
gui.mna.parameter.craft.point: What Magician's Workbench should be used?
gui.mna.parameter.runescribe.point: What Runescribing Table should be used?
gui.mna.parameter.runescribe.recipe:
A Runescribing Recipe for the rune to scribe.
This can be empty, and if so the construct will use the Runescribing Recipe in the recipe slot of the runescribing table.  If neither are present, the task will fail.
gui.mna.parameter.runeforge.point: What Runic Anvil should be used?
gui.mna.parameter.craft.stack: What item should be crafted?  The workbench needs to have a remembered recipe for this item.
gui.mna.parameter.stay.bool: Should the construct be aggressive while waiting?
gui.mna.parameter.butcher.area: What area should the construct look for animals to butcher in?
gui.mna.parameter.butcher.pairs: How many breeding pairs of animals of each type should the construct leave?
gui.mna.parameter.breed.area: What area should the construct look for animals to breed in?
gui.mna.parameter.activate.point: What block should the construct activate?
gui.mna.parameter.chop.area: Where should the construct look for trees to chop?
gui.mna.parameter.collect_fluid.area: Where should the construct look for fluids to collect?
gui.mna.parameter.harvest.area: Where should the construct look for fully grown plants to harvest?
gui.mna.parameter.harvest.rightClickHarv: Should the construct harvest by right clicking?  Use this if you have a mod that enables right click harvest.
gui.mna.parameter.plant.area: Where should the construct look for soil, grass, sand, or soul soil to plant crops in?
gui.mna.parameter.teinteract.point: What block should the construct use for this task?
gui.mna.parameter.collect.area: What area should the construct look for items to collect in?
gui.mna.parameter.collect.filter: What items should the construct look for or ignore? Ignored if a single item is set in the below parameter.
gui.mna.parameter.collect.filter_single: A single item to be used as an alternative quick filter, causing this task to only pick up that specific item.
gui.mna.parameter.eat_item.filter: What items should the construct eat/not eat?  Leave empty for all.
gui.mna.parameter.fish.point: What water block should the construct fish in?
gui.mna.parameter.use_item_on_block.left: Use the item in the left hand
gui.mna.parameter.use_item_on_block.poin: What block should the item be used on?
gui.mna.parameter.has_mana.pct: What percent of max mana must the construct have?
gui.mna.parameter.health_level.pct: What percent of max health must the construct have?
gui.mna.parameter.has_name.stack: An item, which if it has a custom name will be checked against the construct's name for a match.
gui.mna.parameter.has_name.case_insensit: Should the comparsion be case insensitive?
gui.mna.parameter.area_empty.area: The area to search for non-air blocks.
gui.mna.parameter.break_blocks.area: The area to search for blocks to break.
gui.mna.parameter.break_blocks.filter: A filter to apply to blocks broken.
gui.mna.parameter.has_fluid_level.pct: What percent of max fluid capacity must the construct have?
gui.mna.parameter.castAtTarget.point: Where should the spell be targeted?
gui.mna.parameter.castAtTarget.minDistan: How close must the construct be in order to cast the spell?  Line of sight is required regardless.
gui.mna.parameter.castAtTarget.mainHand: Should the construct cast with its main hand (left hand) spell?
gui.mna.parameter.castAtTarget.channelTi: How long should the construct channel spells that can be channeled?  Mana and duration limitations from the spell still apply.
gui.mna.lodestar.start: This is the start node.  Drag from here to the input (yellow pin) of any active node to designate it as the start.
gui.mna.lodestar.error.no_start: You have not configured a start node.  Drag the blue node to the yellow start node of any task to designate it as the start.
gui.mna.lodestar.warning.misconfigured: One or more of your tasks are not fully configured.  They will be skipped if attempted to be run by a construct.
gui.mna.lodestar.warning.unreachable: One or more of your tasks are never reached by the logic flow.  Double check to ensure everything is connected.
gui.mna.parameter.find_entity.filter: A phylactery with any amount of souls inside.  This determines what to look for.
gui.mna.parameter.find_entity.area: Where should the construct look for the entities?
gui.mna.parameter.has_item.filter: A filter for items to search for.
gui.mna.parameter.container_empty.pos: What container should be checked to see if it's empty?
gui.mna.parameter.find_block.block: What block should be searched for?
gui.mna.parameter.find_block.point: What point should the block be searched in?
gui.mna.parameter.fluid_in_container.fil: What fluid should be searched for?  Any item that holds a fluid and has some of that fluid in it will do.
gui.mna.parameter.fluid_in_container.pos: What container should be searched for fluids?
gui.mna.parameter.item_in_container.filt: What items should be searched for?
gui.mna.parameter.item_in_container.pos: What container should be searched for items?
gui.mna.parameter.item_in_container.amou: How many total matched items need to be found in order for this to be considered success?
gui.mna.parameter.item_in_container.indi: If set, each item type will be counted individually instead of the total between all items.
gui.mna.parameter.random_chance.success_: What percent of the time should this task output success?
gui.mna.parameter.is_redstone_powered.po: What block should the construct look at to see if it's powered?
gui.mna.parameter.is_redstone_powered.mi: What is the minimum amount of power required to be considered success?
gui.mna.hud_mode.conditional_show: Only show HUD when holding something that uses mana
gui.mna.codex_mode.esc_out_ui_back: ESC closes the codex, UI buttons go back
gui.mna.codex_mode.esc_ui_back: ESC/UI Buttons go back, ESC closes the codex only from index
gui.mna.codex_mode.rmouse_ui_back_esc_ou: Right Click/UI Buttons go back, ESC closes the codex
gui.mna.codex_mode.rmouse_ui_esc_back: Right Click/UI/ESC go back, ESC closes the codex only from index
event.mna.fey_ritual_no_decider: There is an error in the datapack you are using.  The fey ritual needs to include the summer or winter flowers so the mod knows which season of the fey to set you to.  Please include mna:items/ritual/fey_flowers at least once in your ritual recipe.
event.mna.fey_ritual_conflicting_decider: You have included offerings to both the summer and winter fey.  The ritual has failed.
event.mna.faction_ritual_failed: The entity isn't responding...perhaps it's due to your other allegiances?
event.mna.faction_ally_demons: You feel the hellfire flowing through you, yet it no longer burns.  You have allied yourself with the Demons of the Nether!
event.mna.faction_ally_fey: You feel the warmth of summer on one side of your face and the chill of winter on the other.  You have allied yourself with the Faerie Courts!
event.mna.faction_ally_ancients: You feel the presence of hundreds of wizards current and past, their knowledge and power shared with you.  You have allied yourself with the Council of Ancients!
event.mna.cold_dark_prompt: As the ritual completes, a heavy stone coffin materializes in front of you.  Dare you climb in?
event.mna.faction_ally_undead: As the lich's hand touches you, you feel the breath pulled from your lungs.  You feel cold, getting colder until it feels like it burns. And then, nothing.  Your vision fades to black and you drift.  When you awaken, you feel...different.  You have allied yourself with the Legions of the Undead!
mechanic.mna:faction_affinity: 親和性 / 派閥 / 力

mna:rituals/consume_crystal_soul.no_summ: This ritual will not work with summoned creatures.
mna:rituals/odins_call.sky: This ritual must have a clear line to the sky.
mna:rituals/odins_call.storm: This ritual must be done during a thunderstorm.
mna:rituals/locating.failed: The Ritual wasn't able to find its target within a reasonable distance.

mna:rituals/flat_lands.tooBig: It seems the target area was too large for the ritual and it failed.
mna:ritual-start-failed: This ritual cannot be started right now.
mna:ritual-no-handler: Could not find a registered handler for this ritual recipe.
mna:ritual-start-tier-fail: You lack the knowledge and experience to complete this ritual right now.
ritual.mna.untamed_wind.too_low: You are too low to start this ritual.  Build higher!
ritual.mna.ancient_stone.too_high: You are too high to start this ritual.  Dig deeper!

ritual.mna.endless_void.too_bright: This ritual must be performed in complete darkness.

ritual.mna.searing_inferno.not_nether: This ritual must be performed in the nether.
ritual.mna.forgotten_lore.no_bookshelves: You need more blocks that improve enchanting power surrounding this ritual.  Check the codex.

ritual.mna.progression.wrong_faction: This ritual is not for your faction.  They will not answer your call.
ritual.mna.spell_modification.at-maximum: You cannot add any more modifiers to this spell.
ritual.mna.spell_modification.not-select: You did not select a modifier in the alteration book.
ritual.mna.spell_modification.transcribe: Transcribed spells are not valid for the Ritual of Alteration.
ritual.mna.shifting_seasons.wrong_factio: Only members of the Fey Court are able to complete this ritual.

mna.faction.cant_use_generic: This cannot be used by your faction.
mna:generic.too_powerful: That target is too powerful for this spell.
mna:shapes/touch.desc.radius: Applies a radius to the touch.  When targeting blocks on the side, this center will be shifted so it only goes down one block, the rest will go up, allowing easy tunnels.
mna:shapes/wave.desc.duration: The maximum time the wave can be channeled for before ending automatically.
mna:shapes/wave.desc.speed: How fast the wave moves forward.
mna:shapes/wave.desc.precision: Set this to one to cause the wave to always align to the closest perpendicular axis from which the caster is facing.
mna:shapes/fissure.desc.duration: The maximum time the fissure can be channeled for before ending automatically.
mna:shapes/fissure.desc.radius: The size of the fissure's effect when exploding.
mna:shapes/fissure.desc.speed: How fast the fissure moves forward.
mna:shapes/embers.desc.range: The range at which the created embers will target enemies.
mna:shapes/embers.desc.magnitude: The number of embers created per cast.
mna:shapes/focus.desc.duration: How long you can channel for.
mna:shapes/focus.desc.depth: The maximum distance the channeled point can be from the caster.  While channeling, rolling the mouse wheel to change the distance.
mna:shapes/focus.desc.radius: The size of the channeled point's effect.
mna:shapes/focus.desc.range: The initial distance of the channeled point from the caster.
mna:shapes/wall.desc.duration: The amount of time the wall will exist for.
mna:shapes/wall.desc.range: The maximum distance from the caster that the wall can be created.
mna:shapes/wall.desc.precision: Set this to one to cause the wall to always align to the closest perpendicular axis from which the caster is facing.
mna:shapes/emanation.desc.duration: The maximum time the emanation can be channeled for before ending automatically.
mna:shapes/cone.desc.duration: The maximum time the cone can be channeled for before ending automatically.
mna:shapes/cone.desc.depth: The distance the cone travels forward.
mna:shapes/bolt.desc.range: The maximum distance that the bolt can target.
mna:shapes/beam.desc.duration: The maximum time the beam can be channeled for before ending automatically.
mna:shapes/beam.desc.height: The height of the beam's effect at the point of impact.
mna:shapes/beam.desc.width: The width of the beam's effect at the point of impact.
mna:shapes/beam.desc.depth: The depth of the beam's effect at the point of impact.  This carries forward through blocks.
mna:shapes/beam.desc.range: How far away the beam can target.
mna:shapes/projectile.desc.radius: The radius of the projectile's impact.
mna:shapes/projectile.desc.precision: Set this to 1 to have the projectile target within its radius as a sphere instead of a cube.
mna:shapes/smite.desc.radius: The impact radius when the smite lands.
mna:shapes/smite.desc.range: How far away a smite can be targeted.
mna:shapes/smite.desc.height: The maximum height above the target that the smite can spawn.  The farther it falls before hitting, the larger the damage bonus.
mna:shapes/rune.desc.width: The size of the sigil.  Larger sigils have a larger trigger area.
mna:shapes/rune.desc.magnitude: Controls what the sigil will trigger on.  See the codex for details.
mna:shapes/rune.desc.radius: The size of the sigil's effect when triggered.  Based on the center point of the sigil, not affected by width.
mna:shapes/rune.desc.range: How far away the sigil can be placed.
mna:shapes/bound_sword.desc.damage: The physical damage done by the sword.
mna:shapes/bound_sword.desc.range: The swing range of the bound sword.
mna:shapes/bound_axe.desc.damage: The physical damage done by the axe.
mna:shapes/bound_axe.desc.range: The swing range of the bound axe.
mna:shapes/summon.desc.duration: How long the summon will last.
mna:shapes/summon.desc.range: How far away things can be summoned.
mna:shapes/summon.desc.magnitude: Controls how powerful the summon can be.  Based on maximum health. Each point adds 20 to the maximum health of things that can be summoned.
mna:shapes/summon.nophylactery: I need a filled Crystal Phylactery in my other hand to cast this spell.
mna:shapes/summon.blacklisted: This summon has been disabled via config.
mna:shapes/wrath.desc.duration: The maximum time the wrath can be channeled for before ending automatically.
mna:shapes/wrath.desc.height: The maximum height wrath smites are spawned above the wrath point.  The longer the fall, the higher the damage bonus.
mna:shapes/wrath.desc.width: The horizontal area that wrath smites can spawn around the wrath point.
mna:shapes/wrath.desc.radius: The radius of the individual wrath smite impacts.
mna:shapes/wrath.desc.speed: How fast the wrath moves forward.
mna:shapes/chain.desc.radius: How far the chain can potentially travel when arcing to another target.
mna:shapes/chain.desc.precision: If set, the chain can jump to blocks diagonally.  Has no effect when targeting mobs.
mna:shapes/chain.desc.range: How far the initial target of the chain is.
mna:shapes/chain.desc.magnitude: Each point of magnitude is a 10% chance to arc on hit.  Each hit reduces this chance by 50% until it fails.
mna:components/potion_effect_component.c: The effect doesn't seem to affect %s...
mna:components/recall.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/recall.desc.range: The maximum distance that can be recalled.  Each point raises the cap by 500 blocks.
mna:components/recall.no_marker: I need a Rune of Marking in my other hand to target the spell.
mna:components/recall.too_far: The point marked by this rune is too far away.
mna:components/mist_form.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/mist_form.desc.duration: The maximum duration of the mist form.  Can be ended early by double tapping space.
mna:components/posession.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/posession.desc.magnitude: The strength of the possession.  Higher allows stronger targets to be possessed, by maximum HP.  Each point raises the cap by 20.
mna:components/posession.desc.duration: The maximum duration of the possession.  Can be ended early by double tapping space.
mna:components/mind_vision.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/mind_vision.desc.duration: The maximum duration of the mind vision.  Can be ended early by double tapping space.
mna:components/eldrin_flight.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/eldrin_flight.none-nearby: There were no wellsprings found nearby.
mna:components/frost_damage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.  Useful for getting around i-frames.
mna:components/frost_damage.desc.duratio: The duration of the slowing effect.
mna:components/frost_damage.desc.damage: The damage dealt to affected targets.
mna:components/transitory_tile.desc.dela: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/transitory_tile.desc.dura: The duration of the tile that is created.
mna:components/fire_damage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.  Useful for getting around i-frames.
mna:components/fire_damage.desc.precisio: If set to 1, the spell will not light fire blocks, regardless of what the duration value is.
mna:components/fire_damage.desc.duration: The duration of burning for targeted entities.  If set to zero, blocks will also not catch fire when hit.
mna:components/fire_damage.desc.damage: The damage dealt to affected targets.
mna:components/magic_damage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.  Useful for working around i-frames.
mna:components/magic_damage.desc.damage: How much damage is dealt to affected targets.
mna:components/lightning_damage.desc.del: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/lightning_damage.desc.dam: The amount of damage applied to affected targets.
mna:components/lightning_damage.desc.les: The chance to arc to another target.  Each point is worth a 10% chance.  Each time the bolt arcs, the chance is decreased by 50% until it fails.  A target cannot be hit twice in the same cast.
mna:components/lightning_damage.desc.rad: The radius to search for a target to arc to.
mna:components/shield.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/phantom_sound.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/illusory_creeper.desc.del: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/leap.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/leap.desc.duration: The length of the leaping effect.
mna:components/leap.desc.lesser_magnitud: The strength of the leaping effect.
mna:components/glide.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/glide.desc.duration: The duration of the soar effect.
mna:components/glide.desc.magnitude: The amount of speed boost applied while soaring, allowing better flight.  This increases the passive mana cost.
mna:components/fling.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/fling.desc.speed: The amount of velocity added to the target.  This also controls how much impact damage is applied.
mna:components/ice_spike.desc.damage: How much damage does the spike deal when it hits an entity?
mna:components/ice_spike.desc.duration: How long (in seconds) should the spikes remain before melting?
mna:components/ice_spike.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/grow.desc.duration: How long (in seconds) should the target remain increased in size?
mna:components/grow.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/grow.desc.lesser_magnitud: How much should the target grow when affected by this spell?
mna:components/camouflage.desc.duration: How long (in seconds) should the target remain camouflaged?
mna:components/camouflage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/camouflage.desc.lesser_ma: Set to 1 to allow sneak movement to not break camouflage
mna:components/shrink.desc.duration: How long (in seconds) should the target remain reduced in size?
mna:components/shrink.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/shrink.desc.lesser_magnit: How much should the target shrink when affected by this spell?
mna:components/shrink.desc.magnitude: How strong a creature can this spell affect?  Based on maximum health.
mna:components/water_walking.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/water_walking.desc.durati: The duration of the water walking effect.
mna:components/spider_climbing.desc.dela: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/spider_climbing.desc.dura: The duration of the spider climbing effect.
mna:components/disjunction.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/disjunction.desc.magnitud: The overall power of the enchantment suppression, and the maximum number of enchantment levels it can remove from any single item.
mna:components/disjunction.desc.duration: The duration of the enchantment suppression.
mna:components/crucible.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/crucible.desc.magnitude: The strength of the breaking effect.  Higher values can break stronger blocks.  Can be boosed with or without the modifier by using a Break Ring.
mna:components/dampen_magic.desc.duratio: How long the dampening effect will last.
mna:components/dampen_magic.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/dampen_magic.desc.magnitu: The strength of the dampening.  Mana regen is slowed by 25% plus 10% per point. Magic damage taken is reduced by 10% per point.
mna:components/amplify_magic.desc.durati: How long the amplify effect will last.
mna:components/amplify_magic.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/amplify_magic.desc.magnit: The strength of the amplification.  Mana regen is boosted by 25% plus 10% per point. Magic damage taken is boosted by 10% per point.
mna:components/splash.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/splash.desc.duration: The duration of the soaked effect applied to entities.  Does not affect created water blocks.
mna:components/splash.desc.precision: Set to 1 to disable creation of temporary water blocks and just affect entities.
mna:components/sacrifice.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/sunder.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/sunder.desc.duration: The duration of the sundering effect.
mna:components/sunder.desc.magnitude: The strength of the sundering effect.  Each point removes one point of armor.
mna:components/frailty.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/frailty.desc.duration: The duration of the frailty effect.
mna:components/frailty.desc.magnitude: The strength of the frailty effect.  Each point increases damage taken by 20%.
mna:components/wind_shear.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/wind_shear.desc.height: The target optimal height.  A damage bonus is applied for larger values.
mna:components/wind_shear.desc.precision: The tolerance from the target's position to the optimal height.  Higher precision will do more damage when the target is close to the height, but will fall off quicker when further away.

mna.constructs.feedback.place_block_not_: I can't place a block there, boss, the area isn't clear.
mna.constructs.feedback.place_block_fail: I wasn't able to place this block where you asked me to, boss.  Sorry.
mna.constructs.feedback.breed_no_items: I don't have any items to breed right now boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.breed_no_target: I don't see enough targets to breed right now boss, I'll skip this for now.
mna.constructs.feedback.breed_target: I found %d %ss, I'll try to breed them for you boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.breed_wrong_item: I don't have the right item to breed those, boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.breed_not_config: I can't breed any animals for you right now boss, you haven't configured the area yet.
mna.constructs.feedback.breed_success: Got some %ss breeding for you boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.patrol_victory: Hostile %s is down boss, going pack to patrol.
mna.constructs.feedback.patrol_no_points: I don't have any points to patrol boss, I'm going to skip this.
mna.constructs.feedback.patrol_complete: Done this round of my patrol boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.crush_hands_empt: I can't crush anything boss, I don't have anything in my hands.
mna.constructs.feedback.crush_failed: I couldn't crush this thing, sorry boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.craft_no_recipe: I don't see a recipe for a %s in this bench, sorry boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.craft_missing_it: This bench is missing ingredients, I can't craft a %s for you, sorry boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.follow: I'll follow and guard you boss!
mna.constructs.feedback.attack: I see a %s that's a threat!  I'll protect you boss!  En garde, villain!
mna.constructs.feedback.leashed: This %s isn't vanquished yet but you're too far away, boss!  Wait for me!
mna.constructs.feedback.victory: I've slain the vile %s boss.  On my way back to you.
mna.constructs.feedback.drop_item_hands_: I can't drop anything right now boss, I'm not carrying anything.
mna.constructs.feedback.shear_no_target: I don't see anything that I can shear right now boss, I'll skip this.
mna.constructs.feedback.shear_success: I sheared the %s for you boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.shear_target: I see %d targets that are ready for shearing, I'm on it boss!
mna.constructs.feedback.shear_not_sheara: I thought %s was shearable, but when I got here, now I see it's not.  Sorry boss!
mna.constructs.feedback.shear_not_config: I would start shearing for you boss but you haven't configured the area in the lodestar yet.
mna.constructs.feedback.task_not_configu: This task doesn't have all of it's parameters set, I can't complete it.  Sorry boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.area_scan_starti: I'm scanning the area you set up boss, just a second.
mna.constructs.feedback.area_scan_succes: I found a few things boss, I'll get started.
mna.constructs.feedback.task_not_found: I couldn't find the next task, sorry boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.duel.start: Those about to duel salute you, boss!  This will be fun!
mna.constructs.feedback.duel.target_acqu: I see you over there, %s, let's do this!
mna.constructs.feedback.duel.defeat: Oh no, I lost!  That was a good shot %s, well done!
mna.constructs.feedback.duel.no_banner: I can't duel, boss, I don't have a banner.
mna.constructs.feedback.cast.cant_see: I can't get a line of sight on the target to cast this spell, boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.cast.no_spells: I don't have any spells I can cast, boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.cast.no_mana: I don't have enough mana, boss.
mna.constructs.feedback.cast.success: I did it, boss!  I cast a spell!  I love magic.
mna.constructs.feedback.death: Bye boss.  I hope I did good.  I love you.
mna.constructs.feedback.return_to_table: Return to the table.  Will I dream?  Will I still be me when I return?

mna:tier_0/mine_vinteum.description: This strange ore pulses with a dim blue light.  I wonder what would happen if I smelted it?

mna:tier_0/smelt_vinteum.description: The dust left over from that strange ore seems to have minor magnetic properties.  Perhaps I should combine it with iron?

mna:tier_0/combine_vinteum.description: I was right!  The dust clings to the iron!  It seems to fuse into it slightly from the heat of my hand...should I smelt it again?

mna:tier_0/re_smelt_vinteum.description: This metal is incredible.  I should make a few more and go see if there are villagers that would be interested in trading it.
